title: "Google Drive"
---

## Overview

Google Drive serves as our centralized storage hub for all expedition data, documents, and media.

## Structure

- Expeditions folder (primary organization unit)
  - One subfolder per expedition
  - Standard folders for data, presentations, plans, etc.
- Projects folder for cross-expedition work
- Manuscripts and publications
- Presentations
- Equipment inventory
- Administrative documents

## Best Practices

- Consistent naming conventions
- Proper access permissions
- Regular organization and cleanup
